segments.text: Hello . I'm leaving . Here is my key .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just one second , sir , and I'll give you your receipt . Here you go .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sir , did you enjoy your stay here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , most of my time here was pleasant . And New York itself is fantastic .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm glad you enjoyed the city , anyway . But please don't think too unkindly of us .
segments.speaker: S2
